button.pay.description: Button text for paying an order.

button.continuePay.description: Button text for continuing to pay an order.

button.checkDetail.description: Button text for checking the details of an order.

button.query.description: Button text for querying an order.

button.finish.description: Button text for manually finishing an order.

button.update.description: Button text for updating an order.

field.amount.description: The amount of the order in points.

field.price.description: The amount of the order in points.

field.createdAt.description: The creation time of the order.

field.payWay.description: The payment method of the order.

field.proxy.description: Proxy is an online service used for data transmission as an HTTP proxy.

message.orderExpired.message: Order has expired, please create a new order for payment.

message.wechatPayHelp.message: Please open WeChat on your mobile phone to scan and complete the payment.

message.buyInExternalUrl.message: Please complete payment at an external link.
message.buyInExternalUrl.description: Message for payment through an external link.

message.confirmFinish.message: This action will manually set the order to the paid status and complete the distribution processing. It cannot be undone. Please confirm that the customer has completed the payment. Do you want to continue?

state.pending.description: The status of the order, indicating the order is still waiting for user payment.

state.paid.description: The status of the order, indicating the order has been paid.

state.expired.description: The status of the order, indicating the order has timed out.

state.failed.description: The status of the order, indicating the order payment has failed.

title.info.description: Title used for website, indicating order information.

title.wechatPay.description: Title used for website, indicating WeChat payment.

title.aliPay.description: Title used for website, indicating Alipay payment, Alipay payment is an online payment method.

title.stripe.description: Title used for website, indicating Stripe payment, Stripe payment is an online payment method.

title.manageOrder.description: Title used for website, indicating managing orders.
